title: 11 shall be accompanied by as many copies of plans as the Commissioner may prescribe after taking into consideration the clearances required from other agencies
clause_text: 11 shall be accompanied by as many copies of plans as the Commissioner may prescribe after taking into consideration the clearances required from other agencies. Size: The size of drawing sheets shall be any of those specified in Table 1 hereunder. If necessary, submission of plans on sheets bigger than A0 size is also permissible.

source_pdf.text_snippet: 11 shall be accompanied by as many copies of plans as the Commissioner may prescribe after taking into consideration the clearances required from other agencies.
